description: The Cerbani were an Arabian tribe mentioned by Pliny the Elder.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: inhabitants of Qataban YEM

properties.description: Centerline of label on Barrington Atlas map 4 digitized in QGIS from a raster image of the map that was georegistered by the Ancient World Mapping Center in 2003.
properties.title: BAtlas Label Location
